DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether transcutaneous electrical nerve stimulation ( TENS ) deliver via Empi Select TENS device provide relief chronic lower back pain .
DOC.brief_title: E-STIM Trial : Comparing Efficacy Empi Select TENS Control Treatment Chronic Lower Back Pain
DOC.detailed_description: The E-STIM Trial design collect data efficacy Empi Select Transcutaneous Electrical Nerve Stimulation ( TENS ) device treatment chronic low back pain . This clinical trial non-significant risk , randomize , double-blinded , placebo-controlled 12-week trial involve commercially available Empi Select TENS device treat subject chronic ( > 90 day ) low back pain . Multiple center locate United States enroll approximately 300 subject study . Eligible subject randomize 1:1 either treatment group placebo group . The subject investigational staff blind treatment assignment . Subjects return investigational center follow-up assessment 1 , 4 , 8 , 12 week .
DOC.criteria: Subjects must 1865 year age . Subjects must report low back pain least 3 month duration . Subjects must report low back pain score 4 great 010 point Numerical Rating Scale ( NRS ) average daily pain . Subjects must stabilize analgesic medication regimen 3 month great . Subjects must willing discontinue use rescue pain medication duration trial ( PRN medication breakthrough pain ) , except OTC oral acetaminophen ( 4 gram per day ) . Subjects must willing refrain start new low back pain treatment duration trial . Subjects must willing able comply followup procedure ( include completion daily diary ) return schedule follow visit . Female subject must postmenopausal least 1 year , surgically sterile willing take pregnancy test must negative prior study enrollment . Subjects must willing able provide write informed consent HIPAA authorization prior enrollment study . Subjects demand type pacemaker defibrillator . Subjects previous experience electrotherapy . Subjects fail back surgery . Subjects spinal stenosis contributes , cause lower back pain . Subjects sciatica ( low back pain radicular symptom ) . Subjects cauda equina syndrome . Subjects fibromyalgia . Subjects pain secondary cancer . Subjects cancer anatomical location back pain . Subjects sensory deprivation diagnosis shingle post herpetic neuralgia ( specifically midtrunk region ) . Subjects plan surgery study period . Subjects history alcohol substance abuse last 5 year . Subjects psychoactive medication ( ) : 1. change dose change medication type 3 month prior screen , 2. expect require change dose , new medication study . Subjects seek worker 's compensation legal claim . Subjects pregnant plan become pregnant study period .
